Description:
STAND ALONE TOWNHOUSE
Set on its own 300m2 allotment and ideally situated a ten minute walk from Lake Weeroona, this standalone townhouse offers a flexible floor plan. Featuring 2 bedrooms, both with BIR's a third bedroom which opens onto the lounge which could also be used as a study or separate snug living area. The open plan living area and spacious kitchen look onto the paved rear courtyard. A light filled bathroom and separate laundry with great storage complete the home. Outside features single carport, garden shed/cubby and low maintenance garden. Currently let to excellent tenants at $270 per week, but vacant possession is available. Live in or invest, the choice is yours!
Insights: 2A Marroo Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Ready to live or refurbish in.
In a quiet suburban street, in the heart of White Hills, sits this family home that is ready to live in or refresh. Only minutes from local schools, The Joss House, Tysons Reef Hotel, public transport easily available and a short drive in the CBD, this home offers owners a great location. Families, couples, retirees, first home buyers or those looking for a project, would be ideal for this home.
Inside you will find a large open living area with a kitchen that is equipped with a long benchtop and great storage space, a gas cooktop and oven and overlooks the yard. All 3 bedrooms are a generous size and all feature heating and cooling.
The family bathroom features a large walk in shower and vanity with storage and inside the laundry you will find all the space needed for the washer and dryer along with a large stainless steel sink.
The home features approx 3 metre high ceilings and decorative architraves that bring character to this home. During all the seasons of the year the home will stay cool with ceiling fans and ducted cooling in every room and will be warmed by gas heating.
Outside is a major benefit of this property. Sit and relax in the undercover concreted area whilst overlooking the grassed yard. There are trees and plants that decorate the yard and plenty of room for all activities. There are two sheds that come with the home. One a good sized garden shed, perfect for the handy gardener and a larger shed that can hold cars, tools, trailers and would be ideal for storage.
The home is fully fenced and secure, has multiple car spaces available and features a lovely front yard.
If you are looking for a project to dive straight into or a family just starting out, then this property is calling your name.
Insights: 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
FROM DRAB TO FAB FUNKY FIRST HOME
The owners of this property really know how to transform a post-war weatherboard cottage into a fabulous funky home of the 21st century. They have given it a total makeover including all-important re stumping, trendy new cladding to the front facade, new top-of-the-range double-glazed windows to the front and sides, new paintwork inside and out, new carpets and floor tiles throughout, new bathroom, laundry and kitchen cabinetry plus ducted evap cooling throughout.
A front entry hall leads to the spacious L-shaped lounge/dining with sliding door to the rear, gas heating and air conditioning unit while the roomy kitchen features gas cooking, ample storage including pantry and a big window above the sink overlooking the neat backyard. The bathroom now boasts a walk-in shower, new tiles, vanity and wc. The main bedroom has built-in-robes and all three include ceiling fans for a cooling on breeze on long-hot summer nights.
Outside, easy-care landscaping surrounds the residence with double gates across the driveway securing the big backyard and steel shed.
Set on approximately 746 square metres in a very quiet street and neighbourhood where the kids can walk to primary and high schools school or Lake Weeroona, ride their bikes along the Bendigo Creek Linear Park or catch public transport to town.
A must-see for first home buyers, retirees or investors seeking a neat, sweet and complete property.
Insights: 18 Montgomery Crescent, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Victorian Beauty With Character
Full of character and charm, is this 3 bedroom Victorian home. Featuring a renovated kitchen with quality appliances and modern storage. Two of the three bedrooms have ornate, pine timber ceilings and open fire places. Bamboo flooring throughout, including the impressive hallway - complete with chandeliers that leads into the lounge room. The family bathroom has been updated but has retained it's old world charm. Heating and cooling have been taken care of with two split systems. Outside features include a spacious yard with good shedding, and side access with plenty of parking. The garden has established fruit trees and bamboo plants. At the end of a hard day, what would be better than sitting on the front verandah, behind the high fencing and watching the traffic go by. Close to schools, shops and public transport, plus a short walk to the ever popular Lake Weeroona.
Insights: 472 Napier Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
DECKED OUT FOR A RELAXED LIFESTYLE
Set on approx. 7663 square metres, (1.89 acres) this Queenslander-style residence is a real family pleaser with something for families of all ages and stages.
Spacious living areas include a large lounge with split system air conditioning adjoining open-plan dining and family areas with golden, polished timber floors and cosy solid fuel heating while a huge rumpus room is the perfect party/games room for kids or big family gatherings.
The updated kitchen equipped with 900mm stainless steel, dual-fuel cooker, dishwasher, corner pantry and island bench for casual meals. Imagine being able to watch the changing seasons on the farmland opposite while standing at the sink.
Two bedrooms are located handy to the family bathroom while the spacious, separately located main bedroom has an ensuite and walk-in-robe. The study/4th bedroom has convenient external access making it an ideal home office/workplace.
Wide verandahs on two sides and a rear deck provide ample outdoor living space. The rear deck includes stainless steel outdoor kitchen complete with barbecue and provides a birds-eye view of the decked above-ground pool.
A self-contained unit with carport and private access is perfect for teens, senior family members or extra income. It includes kitchenette, large living room, bedroom with built-in robes and bathroom/laundry.
Two double carports, a double garage and a steel shed 9m x 9m x 3.3m high will appeal to handymen or tradies while the surrounding bush is a great environment for adventurous kids.
Enjoy the best of both worlds in a tranquil bush setting but still handy to the city.
Insights: 1 Watson Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect park-side position.
Don't just "drive by" this property – a complete inspection is a must to discover all it has to offer.
First impressions are lasting and the images that will stay with you are of a clean, neat, perfectly presented home with fresh paintwork inside and out, new carpets and polished timber floors throughout traffic and service areas.
It may not look it from the outside, but it is definitely family-sized and features four big bedrooms, all with robes, updated bathroom with corner spa bath, vanity, IXLtastic and towel cupboard.
The remodeled kitchen is a modern cook's delight filled with natural light and plenty of cabinetry including corner pantry, roll-out pantry, pot drawers and appliance cupboard. Cooking for the family will be a joy with new electric oven, gas cook top and dishwasher for quick clean-ups afterwards.
A huge lounge with dining area overlooks the rear covered outdoor living area and lush lawns while ducted heating and cooling maintain the internal temperature.
Car enthusiasts or tradies will be blown away by the 18m x 7.5m shed with concrete floor, lights and 15amp power points. It includes a dividing wall and plenty of doors for access, convenience and airflow.
The prime location is a bonus for families. Scott Street enjoys lovely wide landscaped nature strips and sports fans will appreciate the White Hills football, netball and cricket clubs directly opposite while for the rest of the family, it's just a short walk to the beautiful and soon-to-be expanded Bendigo Botanical Gardens with the White Hills pool, three primary schools and Weeroona College all within riding distance via the Bendigo Linear Bike Path.
Book an inspection today and beat the rush at Saturdays' open.

Description:
Superb White Hills Location - A Unique Opportunity
Graced with stunningly immaculate interiors, a generous open plan design, and fantastic entertaining options that is sure to make the summer months an absolute joy, this low-maintenance three-bedroom BV home is a stellar opportunity for an array of eager buyers
Safe and secure in a peaceful block and uniquely positioned with own open garage lock up storage
Perfect for both first home buyers and empty nesters, this well-appointed single level beauty has all the tricks. Floating timber floors and quality carpet give this home a modern edge
The light-filled spacious lounge – living and dining zones incorporating the sleek kitchen offering up plenty of bench space with pantry
The well-proportioned bedrooms with built-in robes have easy access to the central modern bathroom.
The great alfresco space includes a merbau deck and courtyard. Then another back-yard area A well-established long front garden welcomes you to the entrance to this superb home.
This property also showcases a separate laundry with outdoor access, gas in wall heating, reverse cycle cooling, a double carport. Double gate for rear access and room for more shedding. Approximate 7x7m undercover entertaining area with open fire & concrete floor, adjoining fernery with shade cloth and approximate 3m wide x 7m long lockup storage shed.
Love the location close to Primary & Secondary schools, Lake Weeroona, and at the end of the wide street the walking treks into CBD Bendigo.
This is a Quality home set in a fantastic street of comparable homes, A Superb White Hills Location - A Unique Opportunity that cant be missed and will not last so be super quick to inspect to secure as your very own today

Description:
Impressive on all levels - Move in and have nothing to do
What an absolute stand-out this freshly presented weatherboard home is on the market today. It has virtually everything you need to move in and enjoy the fruits of our Vendor's labour.
Their pride and joy over the years has seen this 3 bedroom home go through impressive updates that include fresh paint work inside and out, as well as a new kitchen, bathroom and laundry.
Fixtures and fittings compliment the work that has been cleverly taken out by the Vendors, and are so noticeable upon inspection.
Decorative cornice work, L-shaped sizeable lounge/dining with glossy polished pine boards, plus gas hotplates, electric under-bench oven, dishwasher and range-hood, with loads of drawers, bench and cupboard space in the kitchen.
Ducted heating and cooling provide year round comfort.
Outside, meticulously presented, is the secure rear yard including a huge 14m x 3.8m undercover entertaining area with fans and outside shade awnings.
Shed with concrete and power, side access to yard and all so close to schools, walking track, Lake Weeroona, new Bendigo hospital, CBD's cafes and local facilities.
One of the best examples going around on the market today.
Call and book your private inspection.

Description:
Charming home with plenty to offer
On a quiet suburban street, in the heart of White Hills, sits this modern gem. Only minutes from Lake Weeroona, local primary and secondary schools and the centre of Bendigo, this home would be perfect for families, first home buyers, those after a modern investment property or executive couples.
Inside, you will find large living spaces that make relaxing and entertaining easy. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher, double sink, large pantry, kitchen bar and overlooks the outdoor living area. The open dining and family room becomes the centre of the home and is a great space to relax.
The master bedroom is generous in size and offers owners a fully equipped ensuite with shower, vanity and toilet and a WIR with great shelving space. Bedrooms 2, 3, 4 and 5 are also of generous size and include built in wardrobes.
The family bathroom is complete with shower, bath and vanity with storage and in the laundry you will find great space for the washer and dryer, a sink, broom cupboard and backyard access.
Outside is a great benefit of this lovely home. Relax, entertain or spend your days in the undercover entertaining area the opens into the inside living areas.
There is a lovely low maintenance garden with gorgeous flowers, plants and trees for shading and a grassed area. On the yard you will also find a good sized water tank.
Throughout the home you will find downlights, ducted heating and cooling and a lovely tiling colour scheme, that make this house a home.
The home is fully fenced and secure and has a double car garage with backyard roller door access.
If you're after a lovely home to create memories in, then this gem is the one for you.
舒适高格调 3 卧别墅，为于East Bendigo 中心。可步行到East Bendigo Post Office、The All Seasons饭店和Coles 超市。
开车几分钟可到Bendigo CBD，购物中心、餐厅、超市和各种娱乐设施。适合家庭、退休人士、夫妇、首次置业人士和寻找投资机会的您。
优雅50年代室内设计，3米高天花。主卧空间宽敞，设有两个入墙衣柜。二、三卧空间舒适，亦设有入墙衣柜。
厨房设有鲜艳黄色台面和大量储存空间。客厅和饭厅铺设精致地毯。
中央浴室设有淋浴、浴缸和面盆。冼衣房空间宽敞和大量储存空间。
花园有鱼池、鸟屋、各色各样植物及玫瑰，设有浇灌系统，适合爱园艺的您。
室內有大量储存空间，室外设有2 个储存小屋、车库和全围墙保护隐私，舒适之选。
联系我们
中 介︰朱咏恩 (Wing Chu)

办公电话︰03 5443 8500

Description:
A Truly Unique Property. Historically Significant. Dual Occupancy
A grand old lady has been reborn,
A truly unique property full of history & the bonus of dual occupancy. The Former "White Hills Reading Rooms" has been sympathetically transformed into a character filled 3 or 4 bedroom home that oozes history, ambiance & a true sense of self.
The intrigue of this property is satiated the moment you step into the front entrance hall with double doors that usher you through to the large separate Billiards Room with most original features retained including timber wall paneling & ceilings, floorboards & open fire place. This room can be kept quite separate from the main part of the residence lending itself perfectly to a professional home office situation. Passing through the central hallway you enter the former Main Hall, this very large room has the WOW factor & is now a feature kitchen/dining lounge living area of grand proportions with the significant & notable 22' timber lined mansard ceilings as well as leadlight doors & jarrah floors. Inclusive of the custom designed 2Pac kitchen with its amazing butlers pantry with many quirky features.
There are further additional large storage rooms tucked discreetly at the rear of the residence. Most useful & with scope for alternative use. The central bathroom features
an original French porcelain transfer basin & accessories, shower & toilet.
This grand building now comprises 3 or 4 very spacious bedrooms, the master now boasts Velux Sky Light windows, french doors and an open fire place whilst the secnd bedroom is of grand proportions & features decorative corbelling and an open fire place while the third bedroom has built in book shelves & pretty French Door windows.
Original features are self evident & in abundance through out this historically significant property that has itself permanently positioned in the historic fabric of Bendigo & White Hills. But the icing on the cake & a very big bonus here
is the totally self contained solid brick 2nd Residence on this property. Comprising 2 bedrooms, Kitchen dining lounge room, bathroom ,Sep. toilet,laundry & carport.
The imagination runs wild with opportunities here. Perfect for a B&B venture, A self contained work/business space or simply a residence for a dependent relative.
This is a definite potential income producing stream here for the taking. A dual occupancy property with so so much on offer
&all of this is situated on a generous 1011sqm allotment. This is a truly unique property that so rarely become available & with all the hard work done by a very high profile Television House Sale Program, all you have to
do is enjoy.

Description:
Great Value, Affordable Block in White Hills
Build your new home on this fantastic, generous sized allotment, close to town, primary school, child day care, Lake Weeroona and the Botanical Gardens in an established attractive residential area. The walking/bicycle tracks of the O'Keefe Rail Trail are extremely close by, offering a lifestyle choice whilst still being only 3.5kms from the CBD. Measuring approx 524m2 and fenced to three sides with all services available.
Insights: 8 Montgomery Crescent, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018.
